articles.author: Leonie Cater
articles.title: Obsession with growth is destroying nature, 150 countries warn - politico.eu
articles.description: China, India and EU countries were among the signatories of a report that criticized the prevailing measures of economic success.
articles.content: One eighth of the worlds estimated 8 million species of plants and animals are threatened with extinction, according to IPBES. Some 75 percent of the Earths land surface has already been significantl… [+1992 chars]
